message.content:
cs.LG, cs.SI, cs.IR, cs.SOC, cs.DS 

This paper deals with recommendation systems, which is a common topic in machine learning and artificial intelligence. Specifically, it focuses on the exploration-exploitation trade-off in recommendation systems, which is a sub-topic of reinforcement learning. The paper also discusses the use of access-graphs, which are a type of graph structure, in improving recommendation quality. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.SI (Social and Information Networks), cs.IR (Information Retrieval), cs.SOC (Social and Information Networks), and cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms).
